N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 590.4 - Storage of firearms

State Regulations

Except when issued in accordance with this Part, all
firearms, rifles, shotguns, airguns and other weapons shall be stored unloaded
in the appropriately locked arsenal within or under the control of the campus
public safety department of each State-operated campus. Ammunition shall be
stored in a separate area within said arsenal. Access to such firearms and
ammunition shall be limited to the chief administrative officer or such
designee as may be appointed in writing. Notes
